Detailed Description

Base class for all classes that save DSF-based scene settings.

Save filter classes save out a subset of scene settings in a DSF format such as poses, light sets, camera sets, etc.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzAssetIOFilter::DzAssetIOFilter ( const QString &  description  ) 

Create a new save filter with the given name, this is normally called by a child class constructor to set its description.

Parameters:
description The description of the save filter.
